start: To start, please provide your Public and Private keys. - Follow Freedom24 Auth API - Click"Generate a new key pair" button - Click "Secret Key" button Copy both keys and send them here as /start PUBLIC_KEY PRIVATE_KEY Note: your API keys will be stored in the database as raw strings. Do not enable "Allow trading and submission of orders" for security reasons
created: Credentials saved. Hit /start again to change them anytime. See /portfolio to see your portfolio
